phrs.translation: 作者型叙述声音, 作者型声音

sentences.sentence: There are times when the book suffers from excessive authorial control.
sentences.translation: 该书曾几次受到作者过多的限制。

sentences.sentence: Title pages were generally prepared last in the publication process, often without full authorial assent, and in the last-minute rush to press, mistakes were frequently made.
sentences.translation: 标题页通常是在出版过程的最后准备的，常常没有得到作者的完全同意，并在最后一分钟赶着出版时常常出错。

sentences.sentence: You almost never catch a whiff of authorial self-consciousness.
sentences.translation: 你几乎不能捕捉到一丁点儿作者的自我意识。
